recipesJson.name: Chocobutter Cream Cake
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: This is a nice creamy Chocolate and peanut butter vape. Must use TFA peanut butter and inw MILK CHOCOLATE for the best results. Nothing else compares. It's such a great vape. If you like banana add about .5 to 1% Loran's Banana cream to it and call it Elvis. Great as a nice sweet tooth vape. Pairs well with coffee or just to take that sweet craving away.
